android.title: Android
steps: Download PowerTunnel APP from the official GitHub release.
Click the 'Copy PowerTunnel' button above to copy the host link.
Open the PowerTunnel app, tap the three-line menu icon.
Go to Host Settings and paste the copied host URL.
Change the host update period from 12 hours to 'On Start'.
Launch the game and log in to Cloudtopia!

ios.title: iOS
steps: Install Surge 5 from the App Store.
Click the 'Copy iOS Host' button to copy the Surge configuration.
Open Surge 5 and import the configuration.
Launch the game and log in to Cloudtopia!

windows.title: Windows
steps: Click the 'Copy Windows Host' button to copy the host text.
Paste the copied host text at the end of the file and save.
Launch the game and log in to Cloudtopia!
